snippet: IN the summer of 1943, a year and a half after the attack on Pearl Harbor, people were still nervously scanning the skies here to see if anything was going to materialize above the horizon.    Something did....
lead_paragraph: IN the summer of 1943, a year and a half after the attack on Pearl Harbor, people were still nervously scanning the skies here to see if anything was going to materialize above the horizon. Something did.
abstract: California's efforts to reconcile environmental concerns with love of cars discussed; car and truck emissions, source of two-thirds of state's air pollution, have been reduced have been vastly reduced since peak in mid-1950's, although California still has dirtiest air in nation; photo (M)

headline.main: Clearing the Air In the Land of Smog
